interactions.description: Decision: Use existing CXA markdown files instead of corrupted PowerPoint binary

details.decision: Use existing CXA markdown files instead of corrupted PowerPoint binary
details.reasoning: PowerPoint file format is corrupted/encrypted. Individual slide markdown files (slide05, slide07, etc.) already extracted and provide clean usable content
